messages.content: what are some first aid measures for jet fuel?
If exposed to jet fuel, get medical advice/attention [^2]. If it contacts skin or hair, immediately remove all contaminated clothing and rinse skin with water or shower [^2].

messages.content: what are some firefighting measure for jet fuel?

Use water fog, alcohol foam, carbon dioxide, or dry chemical to extinguish a jet fuel fire.  Do not use a steady stream of water, as the product may float on the surface and create a floating fire hazard [^1]. Firefighters should wear full emergency equipment and a NIOSH approved positive pressure self-contained breathing apparatus. Cool fire-exposed containers with water, but prevent run-off from entering drains or water courses [^3].
